channel.title: Yara on Matt's DFIR blog
channel.description: Recent content in Yara on Matt's DFIR blog

item.title: Binary Rename 2
item.description: This is my second Binary Rename post, in this post I am focusing on static detection, that is assessing files on disk. I am going to describe differences between both Yara and Powershell based detections, then share the code.
